alert.note: Alert for Denali (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 3:20PM AKST until January 29 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility occurring. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 1 inch are expected. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...South of the Denali Park Entrance. * WHEN...Until 6 PM Saturday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Look for reduced visibilities at times. Snow drifts will form. North winds gusting to 30 mph. Falling snow will end tonight, but blowing snow will continue into Saturday. Winds are expected to decrease Saturday night with conditions improving then. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
